TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Tundra Exploration - v7.0 (Nov 5th, 2023) - (Re)Stockalike SpaceX Falcon 9, (Crew) Dragon (XL) & Haven-1!

Articles.Content:
ROConfig file for the Flaps and the XXL Gridfins would be great.

This is almost only what is missing for a realistic (physically) Starship in RSSRO.

 

Edited February 23, 2021 by xebx

10 hours ago, damonvv said:

Check my roadmap. Currently I’m not planning to make those. I need more info as these things are still possible to change. 

Where can i find your roadmap?

8 minutes ago, EndAllFilms said:

Where can i find your roadmap?

If you go to the first page you can find the roadmap, but I'll link it here for your ease  

https://trello.com/b/kIaopWmm/tundra-exploration-roatmap
Some more Mothra progress:

12 hours ago, damonvv said:

Some more Mothra progress:



Looks great so far! Will the fairing now be like the falcon 9 one instead of like the stock fairings? Because if so that will be so much better. Good job again

13 hours ago, damonvv said:

Some more Mothra progress:



Will the fairings be SAF-compatible?

On 10/27/2017 at 10:47 AM, damonvv said:

      




Including Iridium Next, New Horizons and soon many more! (Check roadmap for what is coming)

Join me on Discord! (DEV talk only)

(Special Gojira Guide HERE)

  Reveal hidden contents

Tundra Exploration pics:

  Reveal hidden contents











Tundra Technologies pics:

  Reveal hidden contents









Planned features

  • Roadmap

 

Known issues

  • IVAs are weird. The next update will be focused on IVAs!
  • If your Mk4 is black. Make sure your KSP settings have shaders enabled (settings on the homescreen).

 

Required Mods

  • Kerbal Reusability Expansion (For the F9 legs and grid fins)
  • B9 Part Switch                           (For part switching)
  • Animated Decouplers               (For FH sideboosters decoupler)
  • Module manager                       (For all your module manager needs)
     

Not required but highly recommended:

  • Textures Unlimited                   (For a shiny Gojira Mk4)

 

Recommended Mods

  • MAS Interactive IVA (For big screens inside Rodan command pod)
  • Modular Launch Pads (For those awesome towers)
  • Waterfall (For those amazing plumes)
  • Near Future Props (for custom props inside IVAs)
  • Smokescreen (Realplume NOT required!)
  • Kerbal Actuators     (For multiple engine modes on F9)
  • Flight Manager for Reusable Stages (For landing your BFR/F9 first stage)
  • Omega482's Stockalike Structures NTR (For your Ghidorah and Gojira landing needs)
  • Basic DeltaV - Basic Orbit by DMagic (For better understanding of how much fuel you have to land all your crafts safely back)
  • Tundra's Space Center (To launch from LC-40!)
  • Near Future Solar    (For the Solar Panel plugin if you want full 180 degree tracking)


Not supported Mods

  • Atmospheric autopilot
  • FAR



Beta versions on GitHub

 

Realism overhaul config patches (Currently for TE v1.6 only) by @Nessus_

Video by @damonvv

 

A very special thanks to @Beale, @CobaltWolf and @Nertea for the help and advise they give me to make something awesome. And @DiscoSlelge for creating those awesome patches!
And a massive thanks to @Rock3tman_, @Nessus_, @JadeOfMaar, @Starwaster, @neistridlar and @Infinite Monkeys for the help of balancing some of the rockets for a better gameplay!

Version 3.2.1
- Waterfall support for Gojira
- Added Heatshieldless variants for Gojira
- Removed glow on RPTR vac
- Added steel legs

- KSP 1.11 support

- Added more gimbal to the Raptor Engine

- Fixed Cargo Rodan colliders - Fixed mass pass on Gigan
- Make all Ore-holding parts hold empty by default
- Heat limit balance pass
- Fixed octaweb symm, updated subcats
- Snacks! configs updated

- Added Cargo Rodan

- Fixed Mothra One fueltanks (Thanks Jade)

- Fixed tank volume for Mothra upper stage
- Added placeholder IVA for Starship

Version 1.2.1

- Fixed craft files

Version 1.2.0
- Added new Gojira parts (2018 BFR)

Version 1.1.4
- Added new Ghidorah 9 plumes by @JadeOfMaar
- Added new Gigan RCS FX (plume by @Beale

- Fixed Gojira crew pod antenna
- Fixed fairing colliding with upper stage
- Fixed texture slightly off landed Ghidorah version

- Added new Block 5 textures

Version 1.1.2
- KSP 1.4.x
- Added indentations within some part configs
- separated resource defaults without B9PS into patch with same name
- Deleted entries that made KSP think RealPlume is always installed with this mod.
- Merged RealPlume configs into one file
- Added title field to agency and updated scaled logo. Tundra Exploration now appears in Manufacturers filter in VAB.
- Added B9 Part Switch integration to all tanks:
    - Provides fuel options where appropriate.
    - Supports CryoTanks with BoilOff.
    - Provides life support options for USI, TAC, Snacks in Gigan and Rodan command pods.
    - Reduced Ore units per volume due to its volume rating.
- Added Wild Blue Industries integration:
    - WBI resource switching module instead of B9 (B9 option is still there for changing Ghidorah texture).
    - (Only activates when Pathfinder is installed).
- Updated Near Future Solar
- Added B9 Part Switch
Many thanks to @JadeOfMaar for making these patches!


Version 1.1.1

- Updated for KSP 1.4.1
- Updated craft files
- Fixed RCS on Rodan
- Docking hatch moved from 95 degrees to 110

- Removed satellite parts (Moved to Tundra Technologies)

- Fixed RealPlume and SmokeScreen patches (Thank you @macktruck6666

Version 0.2

SootyShaderLoader is based on the custom shader importer by shadowmage and modyfied by DMagic with custom modules and settings.

CKAN is NOT supported by me, any problems with it is not on me. (kinda)

Follow me on Reddit! /u/damonvv



Donate a stroopwafel to support what I do!

How do i activate shaders to my mk4 do not get black?

Just now, JEBEDIAH KERBAL PLAYER said:

How do i activate shaders to my mk4 do not get black?

Game settings/Graphics/Reflection Refresh On

Also make sure that you render quality is Good or above

 

How many more kerbs need this explained to them?

Edited February 28, 2021 by OrdinaryKerman
Damonvv, you will make returnable fairings at Gridorah-9 / Heavy? And you can also make a Gojira tanker?

9 minutes ago, OrdinaryKerman said:

Game settings/Graphics/Reflection Refresh On

Also make sure that you render quality is Good or above

 

How many more kerbs need this explained to them?

It worked, Thanks!

22 minutes ago, RomanIsaev1904 said:

returnable fairings at Gridorah-9 / Heavy?

They already are 'returnable'. The fairing halves are separate, non-procedural parts. Use @NESD's Surface Attachable Control mod to add a probe core inside, add a parachute, done.

22 minutes ago, RomanIsaev1904 said:

Gojira tanker?

Just shove some fuel tanks into the nose of a Cargo Gojira.

Edited February 28, 2021 by OrdinaryKerman

On 2/23/2021 at 8:25 AM, furnace3dgaming said:

Why is it that my starship creates lift when i try to bellyflop and works like an airplane? Is there a way to fix that?

do you have flags on it? I realized that flags cause it to have wayy too much lift and i couldn’t land it.

On 2/28/2021 at 8:46 PM, IsaQuest said:

do you have flags on it? I realized that flags cause it to have wayy too much lift and i couldn’t land it.

Flags aren't the problem. In fact, like @Spaceman.Spiff said, it isn't a problem at all. That's just the natural way that Starship behaves in the game. If your problem is that during re-entry, you try to keep going down, put since you're pitched up a little, you AP will come down to you, and then start going up? If it is, just do what the Space Shuttle would do. Try turning Starship by rolling and yawing to where you would like. This can kind of mess with your inclination, but you can turn the other way if you have to. Then if you want to kill your horizontal velocity entirely, just pitch up as much as you can, so the belly kills your speed, reducing the chance of you ascending again. Just don't do this when your going super fast in the thicker parts of the atmosphere, because it will cause some pretty big G's on your ship and Kerbals.  

And by the way, if you don't like your profile picture, you can change it in your profile, since you have posted over 5 posts
